'Moving', released in 1983, was the third studio album by The Raincoats. It was
re-released in the US by DGC Records in 1993, and in the UK by Rough Trade
Records in 1994, with a different track-list. On its original release the album
reached #5 in the UK Indie Chart. Lazell, Barry (1997) Indie
Hits 1980-1989, Cherry Red Books, ISBN 0-9517206-9-4
